overview.en: BitRewards team, that's been developing e-Commerce loyalty products under GIFTD brand for more than 5 years, had successfully conducted a Crowdfunding campaign for new loyalty products launch, using Blockchain-technology and its own cryptocurrency – BIT .
overview.zh: 由 Cryptojacks (CJ) 升级兑换而来。Bitrewards 平台提供了多种功能，包括：奖励系统，付款处理器，支付网关，加密货币兑换和联盟网络平台。
